title: Serenity of the Cascade
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), ultra-detailed photorealistic image, a serene bald Buddhist monk wearing vibrant orange robes, meditating in the lotus position on a mossy rock pedestal directly beneath a powerful, tall waterfall. The setting is a lush, ancient mountain valley with towering cliffs and dense foliage. A clear rainbow arcs through the intense water spray and mist. Dramatic atmospheric lighting, sunbeams breaking through the canopy, snow-capped mountains visible in the distance. Deep focus, realistic water texture, 9:16 aspect ratio.
negativePrompt: worst quality, low quality, normal quality, lowres, blurry, watermark, signature, bad anatomy, deformed, extra limbs, ugly, noise, cropped, jpeg artifacts, monochrome, multiple people, tiling.
